targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  first_seen AS "Первое появление",
  event_name AS "Событие",
  error_text AS "Текст ошибки",
  occurrences AS "Повторений",
  last_seen AS "Последнее появление",
  infobase_name AS "База"
FROM logs.mv_new_errors
WHERE error_date = today()
  AND error_signature NOT IN (
    SELECT DISTINCT error_signature
    FROM logs.mv_new_errors
    WHERE error_date = today() - 1
  )
ORDER BY last_seen DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT count(DISTINCT error_signature) AS count
FROM logs.mv_new_errors
WHERE error_date = today()
  AND error_signature NOT IN (
    SELECT DISTINCT error_signature
    FROM logs.mv_new_errors
    WHERE error_date = today() - 1
  )

SELECT
  infobase_name,
  count() AS count
FROM logs.mv_new_errors
WHERE error_date = today()
GROUP BY infobase_name
